authors: Matt Morton, based on the original AW sheet by Ryan Sigg & Steve K.
instructions: * Main 'Labels' rolls autocalc the -2 for marked conditions.* Popup box is for the total of roll mods like +1 forward, +1 ongoing, etc.  Enter 3 or -3, but not +3 (the + breaks it).* Rolls auto-cap at -3 or +4 total modifier regardless of input.* 'Sum of Labels' is a safety check against incorrectly-shifted labels or overlooking the +1 at creation.Post feedback and playtest reports on the [Masks Google+ page.](https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/110704683035976001273)
